title: Fabled E-Sports LoL Team LF Top Gold 1 minimum
body:
Hi my name is Primal, I am both Captain and Manager of the Fabled E-Sports LoL Team.

Currently we are looking for a support to trial tomorrow.
Requirements for application:
- 1 Year minimum experience in role
- Actively played through season 8
- Gold 1 rank minimum - Plat 1 rank maximum
- Previous team environment experience highly regarded
- Decent communication etiquette
- Willing to accept constructive criticism
- Appropriate attitude to improve

Contact me via League client, IGN: lI Primal Il, or via Discord: Primal#7722

P.S. also link me your OP.GG and top 5 most comfortable champions in order.

replies.body: I so badly wanna shit talk the thread but he put a maximum rank in, so I don't know if he considers rank relevant to skill or if he just needs a player within the rank in order to be able to play flex.

Don't be triggered just because you didn't meet the requirements kiddo.

It's nice to have an opinion, but 99% sure people don't wanna know when it's shit stirring and irrelevant.

I already make the rank requirement. I just don't like seeing posts where people are looking for a minimum rank because they think it has anything to do with ability.

It is pretty clear that no one player will ever be the judge jury and executioner of any game out of every game that has ever been played. That is why I play starcraft instead. Because faker could only dream of being the level of skill those top players of sc2 are.
